thread.section_title: Wellington Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Top floor is the best!
thread.title_full: Top floor is the best! - Review of Wellington Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kathryn B
title: Top floor is the best!
text:
What a great view. We had three Windows in our room. I loved looking out from the 27th floor and seeing the lights and buildings and even Central Park. The room was clean with a very comfortable bed. Plenty of space for me and my daughter. The staff was very friendly and helpful. It was so comforting to come back to after a lot of walking and touring. It is in a great location being very close to Time square and Central Park And BenAsh is across the street with the best cheesecake around!
Room Tip: Loved being on the top floor See more room tips
